tool.name: Hmmalign
tool.description: Aligns reads on a HMM profile

param.name: input1
param.label: Reference alignment in stockholm format
param.help: You can convert your file format with the tool Convbioseq

param.name: input2
param.label: Hmm profile
param.help: You can make an HMM profile with the tool Hmmbuild

tool.help:
=========== Overview: ===========
Hmmalign aligns reads (fasta file) on a HMM profile (reference alignement built with hmmbuild tool).
Creates a .sth alignment file (stokholm format).
----
.. class:: infomark
For further informations, please visite the HMMER documentation : http://hmmer.janelia.org/
